summary: This mod adds a custom skeleton that corrects the equip-position of two handed axes and hammers.
descriptionHtml:
Hi there!

First of: English isn't my native language. If you find any incorrect grammar, please let me know so I can correct it. Thanks!



This mod adds a custom skeleton that corrects the equip-position of two handed axes and hammers. I edited some nodes in Nifskope for male skeletons. Wearing axes and hammers on the right position gives you a better gameplay and immersion-feeling.

I created this male skeleton long time ago for myself, but thanks to the User "Ultimezia", who asked me very friendly to release it, here it is.

Use it with "Immersive Animations" by bergzore for one handed swords on back animation.

There might be a bug with two-handed swords. So they are at a lower position then before, but it's impossible to fix it without destroying the position of other two handed weapons, because they use the same node in the skeleton.

Have fun with this, maybe I will upload some other mods I created for myself!


EDIT 03.03.2014: Now added a version with one handed swords on hip!
